addr: 1 ALBEMARLE ROAD. All Purpose Room . Brooklyn, NY 11218
title: NYSAA Initial Training 2015-2016 Brooklyn
desc: Information about ELA and math will be forthcoming. All schools with NYSAA students will ?receive the 2015-16 NYSAA Administration Manual from Measured Progress. School staff attending the NYSAA training must bring this manual to the borough training.? This event is only open to current teachers who have the permission of their principals to attend and who are in charge of administering NYSAA Science and Social Studies to New York City Public, Non-Public and Charter school students.
